page.title: 09WILLOW FARM BY JOANNE C.
page.content: MR.HAMPTON LIVES AT WILLOW FARM.HE OWNS 150 ACRES OF LAND.MR. HAMPTON HAS A HERD OF 40 FRIESIAN MILKING COWS.HE MILKS THE COWS TWICE A DAY AT 5.30 AM AND 3.30 PM. THE COWS PRODUCE 1200 PINTS A DAY.FOUR COWS CAN BE MILKED AT ONCE IN THE MILKING PARLOUR.MR. HAMPTON HAS 400 PIGS OF DIFFERENT SIZES.HE HAS 40 SOWS FOR BREEDING.HE HAS YOUNG BACON PIGS WHICH GIVE ABOUT 50 KG OF BACON EACH. EACH WEEK 4 SOWS HAVE A LITTER OF ABOUT 11 PIGLETS.MR. HAMPTON GROWS ABOUT 90 ACRES OF BARLEY AND WHEAT WHICH HE GRINDS TO MAKE CATTLE AND PIG FOOD WITH ADDED MINERALS.IN SUMMER THE COWS ARE KEPT OUTSIDE ON ABOUT 50 ACRES OF GRAZING LAND.IN WINTER THEY ARE KEPT IN LARGE SHEDS.THE PIGS ARE KEPT IN SHEDS ALL THE YEAR ROUND.
